Dear Sir,
Our Investors  (Al Ansari creditors )
is wholly-owned by Ansari group, one of United Arab Emirates largest financial services both in exchange, insurance, and Banking.
Ansari has a paid-up capital of $ 10.1 billion and is rated A1 by Moody’s Investor Services and credit cards.
Our investors are interested in providing financing as debt finance/loan at 4% return on investment with a 1 year interest free.
1. Interest: 4%

3. No Penalty on Early contract termination.
4. Moratorium: 12-24 Months Grace Period
Full terms are to be contained in the contract to be approved by my board's legal team.
Regards.
Dmitry Sergeyevich Peskov
(Al Ansari creditors )
